name: KR: AI Encore
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) A USB Microphone is required to play this game title. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Plug in the microphone and live out your dream as a singing sensation! Sing for the American Idol judges or just for fun.  Compete online and offline in tournaments and head-to-head contests or just grab a second mic and belt out a Duet with a friend.  Do you have what it takes to become the next American Idol? There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
